programme.title: Equestrian - HH The Amir Sword 2025
programme.desc: Experience the thrill and grandeur of H.H. The Amir Sword Festival, the crown jewel of Qatar's racing calendar, from February 13–15, 2025. Hosted by the Qatar Racing and Equestrian Club at Al Rayyan Racecourse, this unmissable event shines a global spotlight on Qatar's rich equestrian heritage and world-class horseracing. Witness the excitement of the season’s two most celebrated races: H.H. The Amir Sword and the H.H. The Amir Trophy presented by Longines. These breathtaking showdowns bring together elite Pure Arabian and Thoroughbred horses from across the globe, competing for a share of the staggering $10 million prize purse and their place in racing history.

programme.title: M3 - Day 3 - ATP 250 IEB+ Argentina Open - Buenos Aires 2026
programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: West Ham have won each of their last three home league games against Manchester United, last having a longer run between 1974 and 1977. Manchester United have lost four of their last six Premier League games against West Ham, more than they had in their previous 28.

programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

Day 3 - M4 - WTA 1000 Qatar TotalEnergies Open 2026
programme.desc: A cornerstone of the early-season WTA calendar, the Qatar TotalEnergies Open takes place on outdoor hard courts at the Khalifa International Tennis & Squash Complex in Doha. A 56-player singles draw competes for 1000 ranking points and a $4,088,211 USD total financial commitment, attracting the world’s top players.

programme.title: T100 2025 Highlights - Qatar
programme.desc: The Ultimate Pro Triathlon Tour. The 2025 T100 Triathlon World Tour takes the world's best pro triathletes on a globe-trotting adventure of 9 races as they fight it out across a season jam-packed with racing in iconic locations spanning April to December in the battle to be crowned T100 Triathlon World Champion.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E3
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: T100 2025 Highlights - Qatar
programme.desc: The Ultimate Pro Triathlon Tour. The 2025 T100 Triathlon World Tour takes the world's best pro triathletes on a globe-trotting adventure of 9 races as they fight it out across a season jam-packed with racing in iconic locations spanning April to December in the battle to be crowned T100 Triathlon World Champion.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match

programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 11 Premier League games against Liverpool since a 1-0 home win in March 2012 thanks to a Nicklas Bendtner strike. programme.title: Brentford v. Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26 - Mini Match

programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won seven of their last nine Premier League games against Brighton and are looking to complete the double over them for the third time after 2022-23 and 2023-24. Brighton have won just one of their six Premier League away games against Aston Villa, conceding at least twice in each of the five games they failed to win.

Alex DE MINAUR (AUS) vs Arthur FILS (FRA) - ATP 500 Abn Amro Open - Rotterdam 2026

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Following their 1-0 win at Molineux in December, Nottingham Forest are looking to complete their first league double over Wolves since 2012-13, and first in the top-flight since 1980-81. Wolves have lost their last two meetings with Nottingham Forest, having lost just one of their previous 14 against them in all competitions.

programme.title: Day 4 - M2 - ATP 500 Abn Amro Open - Rotterdam 2026
programme.desc: One of the longest-running indoor tournaments on the ATP Tour, the ABN AMRO Open is contested on fast indoor hard courts at Rotterdam Ahoy. The 32-player singles field competes for 500 ATP points and a total prize fund of €2,401,550, rewarding aggressive, first-strike tennis.

programme.title: Tremblay vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
programme.desc: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025. Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha. All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and Africa Match for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
programme.desc: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025. Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha. All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and Africa Match for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. programme.title: UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw
programme.desc: The 2026/27 UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw will take place at the Brussels on Thursday, 12 February 2026. The draw will involve 54 participating UEFA member associations, divided into four leagues A, B, C and D. The league phase will start with a prolonged international window from 24 September to 6 October 2026, during which teams will generally play four UEFA Nations League matches in close succession.

programme.title: UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw
programme.desc: The 2026/27 UEFA Nations League - League Phase Draw will take place at the Brussels on Thursday, 12 February 2026. The draw will involve 54 participating UEFA member associations, divided into four leagues A, B, C and D. The league phase will start with a prolonged international window from 24 September to 6 October 2026, during which teams will generally play four UEFA Nations League matches in close succession.

programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.
